comments:
I haven't been able to reproduce the bug because it's timing related, but here is what I was doing:

1) I had two projects, an empty java project, and a simple project full of java packages and .java files
2) I had a java editor open on one of the java files in the simple project
3) In the navigator, I dragged a package root from the simple project to the java project

Autobuild was on.

Here is the stack trace I got:

java.lang.RuntimeException: The resource tree is locked for modifications.
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.UIWorkspaceLock.acquire(UIWorkspaceLock.java(Compiled Code))

	at org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.ProgressMonitorDialog.run(ProgressMonitorDialog.java:335)
	at org.eclipse.ui.views.navigator.NavigatorDropAdapter.doCopy(NavigatorDropAdapter.java:67)

NOTES:
can't reproduce and problem wasn't reported since then. closing.

traces.message: The resource tree is locked for modifications.
